Charles! I trust this

letter finds you well.

The rest of the family and

I are doing just fine.

We constantly pray to God for your safe return to England.

Sister, I too,

think of everyone

daily and am

doing my best.

I have some

bad news, however.

Your girlfriend, Fanny, has married.

Oh!

I had been thinking there still might

be hope for

Fanny and I,

but I guess

I was wrong.

Fanny.

I feel bad having had delivered that letter, seeing how it has affected him.

Is Charles in his room?

Yes,

yes sir!

82
